general_rules.opening_lines: In this game, you will play Tic Tac Toe against a computer player.
general_rules.rules_1: This game will assume that you are familiar with the gameplay and rules of Tic Tac Toe.
general_rules.rules_2: First to win 3 points wins the game. You win a point by winning an individual Tic Tac Toe match and for each match, who goes first gets swapped.
general_rules.rules_3:
For reference:
- You will always go first when you first play the game
- Your mark will always be 'x'
- Computers mark will always be 'o'

choice_layout.opening_line: To choose a square to mark, use the following guide:
choice_layout.concluding_line:
Each number corresponds to its square in the grid.
When it is your turn to choose, pick the number that corresponds to the square on which you want to place your mark.
